#summary Category requests.

= Category requests =

== `/category/get/` ==
Get children of category with given `parent_id`.

*Method:*
GET

*Prameters:*
|| *parameter* || *type* || *description* || *default* ||
|| `parent_id` (optional || `Integer` || Get children of category with given `parent_id` || `0` ||
|| `recursive` (optional) || `Boolean` || Show all subcategories recursively || `TRUE` ||

*Returns:*
`Category` structures.

*`Category`*
|| *field* || *type* || *description* ||
|| `name` || `String` || Name of category ||
|| `parent_id` || `Integer` || Parent category ||
